whitelistUpdates.title: Cursor 2.1 Release
whitelistUpdates.description: Released version 2.1 with improved Plan Mode, AI Code Review, and Instant Grep features. Additionally announced Series D funding of $2.3B and passing $1B in annualized revenue.

whitelistUpdates.title: University of Chicago Study Results
whitelistUpdates.description: A new study from the University of Chicago finds that companies merge 39% more PRs after Cursor's agent became the default, demonstrating significant productivity improvements.

whitelistUpdates.title: Semantic Search Performance Enhancement
whitelistUpdates.description: Implemented semantic search that significantly improves coding agent performance with 12.5% higher accuracy, improves code retention and decreases dissatisfied user requests.

whitelistUpdates.title: Continue 1.5.14 Stable Release
whitelistUpdates.description: Released stable version 1.5.14 with multiple package updates including @continuedev/openai-adapters@1.31.1 and @continuedev/llm-info@1.5.1.

whitelistUpdates.title: Continue CLI Beta Updates
whitelistUpdates.description: Multiple beta releases with daily updates from Nov 21-24, including CLI Beta v1.5.14-beta.20251124 with ongoing improvements and bug fixes.

insights.title: Claude Code Works More Autonomously
insights.description: Anthropic announces improvements to Claude Code's autonomous capabilities, allowing AI agents to work more independently on coding tasks with enhanced reasoning and self-correction abilities.
insights.author: Anthropic

insights.title: Claude Sonnet 4.5 Sets New Benchmark Records in Coding
insights.description: Anthropic releases Claude Sonnet 4.5 with significantly improved coding performance, establishing new benchmark records for code generation and debugging capabilities.
insights.author: Anthropic

insights.title: Claude Haiku 4.5 Delivers Unprecedented Speed for Coding Tasks
insights.description: Anthropic introduces Claude Haiku 4.5, optimized for rapid coding tasks with significantly faster response times while maintaining high code quality output.
insights.author: Anthropic

insights.title: Building and Testing C Extensions for SQLite with ChatGPT Code Interpreter
insights.description: Simon Willison demonstrates practical AI-assisted development using ChatGPT Code Interpreter to build and test C extensions for SQLite, showing real-world AI coding applications.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: Running Llama 3.2 Vision and Phi-3.5 Vision on a Mac with mistral.rs
insights.description: Technical guide on deploying vision models locally on Mac computers using mistral.rs, enabling developers to run powerful multimodal AI models without cloud dependencies.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: I Can Now Run a GPT-4 Class Model on My Laptop
insights.description: Simon Willison explores the capabilities of running large language models locally, discussing performance implications and the future of AI development without cloud dependencies.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: Google ADK-Go: Go Toolkit for Building AI Agents
insights.description: Google releases a Go toolkit for building AI agents with flexibility and control, trending on GitHub as a popular open-source AI development framework.
insights.author: Google

insights.title: LightRAG: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation
insights.description: HKUDS releases LightRAG, a simple and fast retrieval-augmented generation framework that's gaining traction in the AI development community.
insights.author: HKUDS

insights.title: Memori: Open-Source Memory Engine for LLMs and AI Agents
insights.description: GibsonAI releases Memori, an open-source memory engine designed to provide persistent memory capabilities for LLMs and AI agents.
insights.author: GibsonAI

insights.title: Microsoft Call Center AI: AI Agent API for Making Phone Calls
insights.description: Microsoft releases an AI agent API specifically designed for call center applications, enabling automated phone call capabilities with advanced AI reasoning.
insights.author: Microsoft

insights.title: General Principles for the Use of AI at CERN
insights.description: Hacker News discussion on CERN's guidelines for AI usage, covering responsible AI deployment in scientific computing and research environments.
insights.author: CERN/Hacker News Community
